member.name: IObjectProvider.QueryObject
member.param: A reference to the GUID used to identify the object.
On success, contains the address of a pointer to the object specified by riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IObjectProvider
member.summary: Exposes a method to discover objects that are named with a GUID from another object. Unlike QueryService this interface will not delegate its functionality on to other objects.
